```{r pkgs}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(statskier2)
library(patchwork)

statskier_connect()
```

```{r gen-snap}
location <- "Ruka"
tech <- "Classic"
men_spr_id <- 20295
wom_spr_id <- 20294

p_men <- race_snapshot_spr(
  event_id = men_spr_id,
  title = glue::glue("Men's {loc} {tech} Sprint",loc = location,tech = tech),
  reduced = TRUE)

p_wom <- race_snapshot_spr(
  event_id = wom_spr_id,
  title = glue::glue("Women's {loc} {tech} Sprint",loc = location,tech = tech),
  reduced = TRUE)
```

### Men's Race Snapshot
```{r men-snap,fig.height=10,fig.width=7}
p_men$plot
```

### Women's Race Snapshot
```{r wom-snap,fig.height=10,fig.width=7}
p_wom$plot
```

### Heat Progressions
```{r heat-progressions}
#| fig-height: 13
#| fig-width: 15
wom_heat_raw <- spr_heat_plot(
  .eventid = wom_spr_id,
  subtitle = "QF & SF heats indicated by numbers on the plot.",
  time_scale = "raw",
  clip = c(160,180))
men_heat_raw <- spr_heat_plot(
  .eventid = men_spr_id,
  subtitle = "QF & SF heats indicated by numbers on the plot.",
  time_scale = "raw",
  clip = c(140,160))

wom_heat_med <- spr_heat_plot(
  .eventid = wom_spr_id,
  subtitle = "QF & SF heats indicated by numbers on the plot.",
  time_scale = "median",
  clip = c(-10,10))
men_heat_med <- spr_heat_plot(
  .eventid = men_spr_id,
  subtitle = "QF & SF heats indicated by numbers on the plot.",
  time_scale = "median",
  clip = c(-10,10))

all_heats <- 
  wom_heat_raw + 
  wom_heat_med + 
  men_heat_raw + 
  men_heat_med + 
  plot_layout(guides = 'collect')
all_heats
```
